Package mil.emp3.api.listeners

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICameraEventListener
    A class must implement this interface to process camera events.
    IContainerEventListener
    This interface defines the event listener for container events.
    IDrawEventListener
    A class must implement this interface to process draw events.
    IEditEventListener
    A class must implement this interface to process edit events.
    IEventListener<T extends IEvent>
    This interface defines the base of all event listener interfaces.
    IFeatureDrawEventListener
    A class must implement this interface to process feature draw event.
    IFeatureEditEventListener
    A class must implement this interface to process feature edit event.
    IFeatureEventListener
    The is the interface a class must implement to receive feature events.
    IFeatureInteractionEventListener
    The is the interface a class must implement to receive feature interaction events.
    IFreehandEventListener
    A class must implement this interface to process freehand draw events.
    ILookAtEventListener
    Created by raju on 7/22/2016.
    IMapFeatureAddedEventListener
    A class must implement this interface to process map feature added events.
    IMapFeatureRemovedEventListener
    A class must implement this interface to process map feature removed events.
    IMapFreehandEventListener
    This class defines the interface of a map freehand event listener.
    IMapInteractionEventListener
    A class must implement this interface to process map interaction events.
    IMapStateChangeEventListener
    A class must implement this interface to process map state change events.
    IMapViewChangeEventListener
    A class must implement this interface to process map view change events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventListenerHandle
    This abstract class is the handle return by the add event listener method.
    IVisibilityEventListener
    A class must implement this interface to process visibility events.
